Title: Requires additional disclosures from lobbyists
Summary: Requires additional disclosures from lobbyists including: campaign contributions to elected officials; existing business relationships or associations with public officials; and the names of family members of a public official to whom the lobbyist, or his or her employer, paid compensation of over $500 in the preceding calendar year and the amount of compensation paid; provides for the disposition of campaign funds.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law and the election law, in relation to disclosures required for lobbyists; and to amend the election law and the public officers law, in relation to campaign funds for personal use
